data.current_description: Get a Riddle entry for a given id. Retrieves a riddle question and answer based on the id.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a stored riddle by ID
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a specific riddle entry from your private riddle collection by its unique identifier. Returns the complete riddle object including the question and answer. Requires authentication via API key.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity about authentication requirements, that this retrieves from private collection, and what the response structure contains. Added context about private storage, authentication, and complete response details for AI agent clarity.

message: Operation 'post_/riddle' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Missing summary. Description is vague about what 'random' means in context and lacks input/output details. Clarified that this creates a new entry (not retrieves random), specified expected parameters, return value, and side effect of storing the riddle. Improved AI agent understanding of when to use POST vs PUT.

data.current_description: Create a random Riddle entry. Same as 'PUT' but can be used when some of the client libraries don't support 'PUT'.
data.summary_suggestion: Create a new private riddle entry
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new riddle entry in your private riddle collection. Accepts riddle question, answer, and optional category as input parameters. Returns the newly created riddle object with assigned ID. Functionally equivalent to PUT /riddle for clients that don't support PUT method.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is vague about what 'random' means in context and lacks input/output details. Clarified that this creates a new entry (not retrieves random), specified expected parameters, return value, and side effect of storing the riddle. Improved AI agent understanding of when to use POST vs PUT.

message: Operation 'put_/riddle' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects, not_actionable. Missing summary. Description is misleading - 'random' suggests retrieval but operation creates entries. Lacks input parameter details, output structure, and side effects. Clarified the action is creation (not random retrieval), specified inputs and outputs, and explained the storage side effect for better AI agent interpretability.

data.summary_suggestion: Create a new private riddle entry
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new riddle entry in your private riddle collection. Accepts riddle question, answer, and optional category as input parameters. Returns the newly created riddle object with assigned ID. Stores the riddle for later retrieval.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is misleading - 'random' suggests retrieval but operation creates entries. Lacks input parameter details, output structure, and side effects. data.summary_suggestion: Delete a private riddle by ID
data.description_suggestion: Deletes a specific riddle entry from your private riddle collection by its unique identifier. Requires the riddle ID as input parameter. Returns confirmation of deletion. This operation permanently removes the riddle and cannot be undone.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is completely incorrect - says 'Create' for a DELETE operation. data.current_description: Get a random riddle for a given category(optional)
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a random riddle by category
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a random riddle from the public riddle database. Accepts an optional category parameter to filter results. Returns a riddle object containing the question and answer. If no category is specified, returns a riddle from any category.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks clarity about public vs private source, parameter details (what categories are available), and response structure. Added context about public database, clarified optional category behavior, and specified return format for AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: Search for random riddle which has the text in the query, for a given category(optional).
data.summary_suggestion: Search riddles by text and category
data.description_suggestion: Searches the public riddle database for riddles matching the provided search query text. Accepts a required search query parameter and optional category filter. Returns a list of riddle objects whose questions or answers contain the search text. Results can be further filtered by category if specified.
